name: rreadlink
description: A multi-platform Unix CLI that prints a symlink's complete chain of targets using absolute paths.

scripts.postinstall: bash --version >/dev/null 2>&1 || printf '%s\n\n' "WARNING: bash not found; make sure it is installed before running this utility." >&2

author: Michael Klement <mklement0@gmail.com> (http://same2u.net)
